pages.title: Controls
pages.text: Jade has a few simple keyboard shortcuts.$(br2)$(l)NUMPAD 1$()$(br)$(#939799)$(o)Toggles the tooltip on and off.$()$(br2)$(l)NUMPAD 2$()$(br)$(#939799)$(o)Toggles Jade showing info on liquids.$()$(br2)$(l)NUMPAD 3$()$(br)$(#939799)$(o)Will show you recipes for what you are looking at.$()$(br2)
$(l)NUMPAD 4$()$(br)$(#939799)$(o)Will show you uses for what you are looking at.$()$(br2)$(l)SHIFT$()$(br)$(#939799)$(o)Shows expanded info on the tooltip (if any)$()
